meanings.definition: The flat, movable bone at the front of the knee joint.
meanings.sent1: Her patellas help her bend her legs.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined his patellas during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The patellas decided to take a break from all the bending.
meanings.sent4: His patellas were like hinges, allowing smooth movement.
meanings.sent5: The patellas are like little shields protecting the knee joint.

meanings.sent1: She felt a sharp pain in her patellas when she fell.
meanings.sent2: He wore protective gear to shield his patellas during the game.
meanings.sent3: The patellas seemed to have a mind of their own, bouncing around.
meanings.sent4: Her patellas were like two small rocks under her skin.
meanings.sent5: The patellas popped out like little buttons on her knees.
